entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,71001}This is a {F804,5}relic.{F804,0} It's one of the{F801}things the Monastery is searching for.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,71001}This is a {F804,5}relic.{F804,0} It's one of the{F801}things the Monastery is searching for.{F801}

entry.source: Mystic relics can be found in various{F801}places on the map. They are rare and{F801}precious both in Tokyo and Mikado.{F801}{F802}Mystic relics can be sold at shops in{F801}exchange for Macca.{F801}
entry.target: Mystic relics can be found in various{F801}places on the map. They are rare and{F801}precious both in Tokyo and Mikado.{F801}{F802}Mystic relics can be sold at shops in{F801}exchange for Macca.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,71002}Let's search high and low for them!{F801}I'll be your guide.{F801}
